name: Verify the account creation functionality.
description: This test case verifies that a new user account can be created successfully using the SignUp API.
descriptionHtml: This test case verifies that a new user account can be created successfully using the SignUp API.
statusMessage:
expected [User registered successfully!] but found [{
    "timestamp": "2025-08-15 17:38:57",
    "status": 500,
    "error": "System Error",
    "message": "An unexpected error occurred",
    "path": "uri=/api/auth/signup",
    "solution": "Please try again later or contact support",
    "errorCode": "SYS_001"
}]
